about_the_game:
If you really like our game and you want to support our team, please check out this DLC.
You can't imagine how much this could mean to us! (ﾉ◕ヮ◕)ﾉ

This is the Digital Artbook we did to show you the art of Star Story: The Horizon Escape - learn the thought behind the game's artwork.

These files will be in your Steam folder:
steamapps\common\Star Story The Horizon Escape\dlc_ArtBook

Sincerely yours, from Russia with love, EvilCoTeam. (ಥ﹏ಥ)
detailed_description:
Steam Exclusive Offer

NOTE: This package includes only Digital Artbook in PDF format. It is fully the same as FREE version Artbook DLC!
